title: Professional Development Workshop for Sports Coaching Policy Development and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic education policy knowledge, fundamental sports coaching principles, and leadership theory
context.additional_context: Learners (teachers/pre-service teachers) experience the process of developing sports coaching policies using VR simulations in a limited technological environment (smartphone-based) and propose practical implementation plans through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to analyze cultural changes in sports organizations and develop policy strategies
Learners predict interactions among stakeholders during coaching policy implementation through VR simulations
Learners design and evaluate practical physical education policy models through small-scale team projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
